ComicInfo.Title: Fractured, Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
Overview
“Fractured” Part 1 (of 3)
The aftermath of the X-Men's battle against the HECATOMB has cost CABLE a huge chunk of his island paradise of Providence and an even bigger slice of his soul. With all his hopes for the future of the planet Earth in jeopardy, now would be a pretty bad time for a reunion with DEADPOOL, wouldn't it? And an even worse time for... an assassination!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:06:26. [CVDB110433]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Reilly Brown, Reilly Brown, Skottie Young
ComicInfo.Inker: Jeremy Freeman, Reilly Brown, Skottie Young
ComicInfo.Characters: Black Box, Bob, Agent of HYDRA, Cable, Cannonball, Deadpool, Domino, Iceman, Irene Merryweather, Lady Mastermind, Mystique, Omega Sentinel, Outlaw, Prester John, Rogue, Sabretooth
